member.summary: The roles that are allowed to access this content. If empty, only authentication is required.

member.summary: If true, requires the user to be authenticated (regardless of role).

member.summary: Custom redirect URL when unauthorized. Defaults to /unauthorized.

member.summary: The child content to render when authorized.
